channel.title: Microsoft Frontpage on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Frontpage on Tedium: The Dull Side of the Internet.

item.title: Your Code Is Junky
item.description: Today in Tedium: As I’ve covered a few times in the past, the hard part about any budding technology—whether it’s delivering packages, driving down interstate highways, or beaming satellite signals to homes around the country—is the infrastructure, how easy that infrastructure is to use. The internet is obviously a pretty key example of this issue in action, with products like WebTV and CompuServe imagining a specific direction for reading content online.
